scripts.install-build-deploy: git pull --no-rebase && npm i && npm run build && pm2 restart starters-tanguay-eu
scripts.build-deploy: git pull --no-rebase && npm run build && pm2 restart starters-tanguay-eu --update-env --time && pm2 save
scripts.do-deploy: git pull --no-rebase && pm2 restart starters-tanguay-eu --update-env --time && pm2 save
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m "predeploy" && git push
